thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Mall Owners Flock to Transit Hubs

author: Esther Fung
title: Mall Owners Flock to Transit Hubs
text:
The outlook for shopping malls is terminal. As in transportation terminal.
Some retail landlords, in their quest for ways to boost foot traffic and grab customersâ€™ attention, are betting on the long corridors that take the masses to and from planes, trains and automobiles.
Drawing commuters out of transit hubs and into shopping areas can be...
